label: 125 matter trapped on 4D brane
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Brane-world: 125 visible roots trapped on 4D brane
# Only gravity (163 sterile) leaks to bulk
# Matter localized, gravity delocalized

matter_on_brane = visible      # 125
gravity_in_bulk = hidden       # 163
note: 125 visible matter trapped on 4D brane; only gravity (163 sterile) leaks to bulk
